column4: Hey guys I have a problem with thunderbird and firefox when i try to open them it says that there is a window open and to close that first, there are not though, i have even rebooted and it says that?
, if you go into your sessions manager, you can end the task.  You will see two files, Firefox and Firefox.bin.  if you close the .bin file, both will disappear...then open up firefox again
there isn't one in there im using ngome btw.
